title: Update Retail Gas Station Prices
description: A pricing analyst for a retail fuel brand needs to update the gasoline and diesel prices for a set of stations based on competitor prices and market costs.

tasks.description: Gather the latest street-level prices for key competitors near station #6789.
tasks.expected_outcome: A list of competitor prices is retrieved from a price monitoring service.

tasks.description: Using the company's pricing model, calculate the new optimal prices for all fuel grades at the station.
tasks.expected_outcome: The pricing algorithm recommends new prices to maintain a target margin while staying competitive.

tasks.description: Push the new prices to the station's point-of-sale (POS) system and electronic price sign.
tasks.expected_outcome: The prices at the gas station are successfully updated.
